title: Patterns and Tools
text: You can now leave pixels in your custom patterns transparent, which looks nice on the ground or on faces (see the pawprints?). Weak tools can also break now, so craft extra!

title: Returning Special Characters
text: Sahara will now sell you wallpaper, carpets, or small rugs. Some are even animated, like the water carpet making splashes! Gulliver also returns with a fetch minigame for a prize

title: Fun Facts Vol. 7: New Features
text: Some new features include birthday pinatas, a huge expandable inventory, and customizable face paint (with patterns)!!

title: Returning Secrets
text: Returning from previous games, we can find bottles with messages from other players on the beach again, and golden dirt returns too!

title: Direct News Vol. 6
text: Last bit of news, you'll be able to scan QR codes of old patterns through the Switch Online app, and the game will get free holiday updates in the future!

title: Direct News Vol. 5
text: You can now choose where new villagers can move in. You can dress up villagers in costumes and outfits in a new photoshoot mode!

title: Direct News Vol. 4
text: Item management is greatly improved through an item wheel, a wand to change outfits whenever, and closets to try on clothes!

title: Direct News Vol. 3
text: You now choose a base island to start with, but you'll be able to terraform it to your liking later on, or hop on the plane to explore random islands!

title: Direct News Vol. 2
text: Furniture and home customization look better than ever with in-depth tools and exterior customization

title: Direct News Vol. 1
text: We'll now see villagers eating, exercising, sweeping, and even randomly dancing on the spot! Their personalities have definitely been expanded!

title: Buildable Stairs
text: A new advertisement shows off brick paths and stairs that you can build outside to climb up cliffs

title: More New Characters
text: A Switch sticker decal reveals a few new villagers, 2 dodo brothers, a possible Sow Joan relative, and a new horned lizard character!

title: Fun Facts Vol. 6: Player Details
text: Our player characters are now more customizable and detailed than ever before with things like backpacks/back accessories, detailed hair, noses, kneecaps, and bellybuttons. Yes, bellybuttons

title: Fun Facts Vol. 5: Phone Cases
text: It seems like you'll even be able to customize the back of your Nookphone

title: Fun Facts Vol. 4: Island Decor
text: You'll soon be able to customize your village more than ever by placing furniture outside, making pathways with a new tool, and placing fences to make a backyard

title: Fun Facts Vol. 3: Animal Actions
text: In New Horizons, you may notice your villagers interacting with the world a bit more. They can now carry crafting materials, go fishing, and sit wherever they want

title: Fun Facts Vol. 2: Animal Clothing
text: In this game, you'll see your villagers in more varied clothing than before. They can now wear dresses, long sleeves, and even accessories. Sheep even wear shirts now instead of scarves

title: Fun Facts Vol. 1: New Characters
text: The box art revealed 2 new characters. A dodo, who is probably in charge of flying you to the island, and a beaver, who looks similar to Chip

title: Pre-Order Bonuses
text: Best Buy has revealed a phone badge as a pre-order bonus. Target will give out a journal as a purchase bonus

title: First Trailer
text: A short story trailer for the game was released, as well as the box art

title: New Styles
text: Some official renders displaying brand new clothing, hair styles, hair colors, and even noses!

title: Spanish Themes
text: New Horizons will include a Spanish localization and new Spanish-themed clothing
